xml-resources.entry: select rol_name as name, rol_id as id from dcl_role
select * from dcl_user_setting where usr_id = :usr_id
select * from dcl_user_setting where usr_id = :user.usr_id
select * from dcl_user_setting where ust_id = :ust_id
update dcl_user_setting set ust_description = :ust_description, ust_value = :ust_value, ust_value_extended = :ust_value_extended where ust_id = :ust_id
insert into dcl_user_setting ( ust_name, ust_description, ust_value, ust_type, usr_id ) values ( :ust_name, :ust_description, :ust_value, :ust_type, :usr_id );
select inm_id as "id", inm_create_date as "date", inm_message as "message" from dcl_inf_message where usr_id = :user.usr_id
delete from dcl_inf_message where inm_id = :id
insert into dcl_inf_message( usr_id, inm_message ) values( :user.usr_id, :message )

select pms_id, pms_create_date, pms_message, pms_sum, ctr_id as "contractor.id", ctr_name as "contractor.name", pms_percent, pms_updated, cur_id as "currency.id", cur_name as "currency.name" from dcl_pay_messages_load(:user.usr_id)
delete from dcl_pay_message where pms_id = :pms_id
execute procedure dcl_save_payment_messages( :pay_id, :managerRoleId, :msgReceivedPayment, :msgReceivedPaymentByCon, :msgFrom, :msgSpec, :msgComment )
select cms_id as "id", cms_create_date as "date", cms_message as "message", ctr_id as "contractor.id", ctr_name as "contractor.name" from dcl_con_messages_load(:user.usr_id)
delete from dcl_con_message where cms_id = :id
execute procedure dcl_save_contract_messages( :con_id, :spc_id, :ctr_id, :msg )
select ccm_id as "id", ccm_create_date as "date", ccm_message as "message", ctr_id as "contractor.id", ctr_name as "contractor.name" from dcl_cfc_messages_load(:user.usr_id)
delete from dcl_cfc_message where ccm_id = :id
execute procedure dcl_save_cfc_messages( :cfc_id, :ctr_id, :msg )
select orm_id as "id", orm_create_date as "date", orm_message as "message", 0 as "contractor.id", ctr_name as "contractor.name" from dcl_ord_messages_load(:user.usr_id)
delete from dcl_ord_message where orm_id = :id
execute procedure dcl_save_ord_messages( :ord_id, :prc_id, :managerRoleId, :msg )

select uln_id as "id", uln_create_date as "date", uln_url as "url", uln_parameters as "parameters", uln_text as "text", uln_menu_id as "menuId" from dcl_user_link where usr_id = :usr_id order by uln_create_date descending
execute procedure dcl_save_cfc_eco_msg( :economistRoleId, :url, :parameters, :text, :menuId )
delete from dcl_user_link uln where uln.uln_url = :url and uln.uln_parameters = :parameters;

select * from dcl_commercial_proposal_filter( :number, :contractor.name, :date_begin_date, :date_end_date, :sum_min, :sum_max, :user.usr_name, :department.name, :stuffCategory.name, :cpr_proposal_received_flag_in, :cpr_proposal_declined_in )

select cpr_id from dcl_commercial_proposal_insert ( :cpr_date_ts, :cpr_number, :contractor.id, :contactPerson.cps_id, :cpr_concerning, :cpr_concerning_invoice, :cpr_preamble, :currency.id, :cpr_course, :cpr_nds, :priceCondition.id, :cpr_country, :cpr_pay_condition, :cpr_pay_condition_invoice, :deliveryCondition.id, :cpr_delivery_address, :cpr_sum_transport, :cpr_all_transport, :cpr_delivery_term, :cpr_delivery_term_invoice, :cpr_add_info, :cpr_final_date_ts, :cpr_final_date_invoice, :user.usr_id, :executor.usr_id, :cpr_executor_flag, :cpr_date_accept_ts, :blank.bln_id, :cpr_img_name, :cpr_proposal_received_flag, :cpr_block, :cpr_summ, :cpr_nds_by_string, :cpr_sum_assembling, :cpr_old_version, :currencyTable.id, :cpr_assemble_minsk_store, :cpr_free_prices, :cpr_can_edit_invoice, :cpr_comment, :purchasePurpose.id, :cpr_reverse_calc, :contactPersonSeller.cps_id, :contactPersonCustomer.cps_id, :cpr_guaranty_in_month, :cpr_prepay_percent, :cpr_prepay_sum, :cpr_delay_days, :cpr_no_reservation, :cpr_provider_delivery, :cpr_provider_delivery_address, :cpr_delivery_count_day, :cpr_donot_calculate_netto, :cpr_print_scale, :cpr_contract_scale, :cpr_invoice_scale, :cpr_final_date_above, :consignee.id, :cpr_tender_number, :cpr_tender_number_editable, :cpr_proposal_declined )

update dcl_commercial_proposal set cpr_number = :cpr_number, cpr_date = :cpr_date_ts, ctr_id = :contractor.id, cps_id = :contactPerson.cps_id, cpr_concerning = :cpr_concerning, cpr_concerning_invoice = :cpr_concerning_invoice, cpr_preamble = :cpr_preamble, cur_id = :currency.id, cur_id_table = :currencyTable.id, cpr_course = :cpr_course, cpr_nds = :cpr_nds, trm_id_price_condition = :priceCondition.id, cpr_country = :cpr_country, cpr_pay_condition = :cpr_pay_condition, cpr_pay_condition_invoice = :cpr_pay_condition_invoice, trm_id_delivery_condition = :deliveryCondition.id, cpr_delivery_address = :cpr_delivery_address, cpr_sum_transport = :cpr_sum_transport, cpr_all_transport = :cpr_all_transport, cpr_sum_assembling = :cpr_sum_assembling, cpr_delivery_term = :cpr_delivery_term, cpr_delivery_term_invoice = :cpr_delivery_term_invoice, cpr_add_info = :cpr_add_info, cpr_final_date = :cpr_final_date_ts, cpr_final_date_invoice = :cpr_final_date_invoice, usr_id = :user.usr_id, executor_id = :executor.usr_id, cpr_executor_flag = :cpr_executor_flag, cpr_date_accept = :cpr_date_accept_ts, bln_id = :blank.bln_id, cpr_img_name = :cpr_img_name, cpr_proposal_received_flag = :cpr_proposal_received_flag, cpr_block = :cpr_block, cpr_summ = :cpr_summ, cpr_nds_by_string = :cpr_nds_by_string, cpr_old_version = :cpr_old_version, cpr_assemble_minsk_store = :cpr_assemble_minsk_store, cpr_free_prices = :cpr_free_prices, cpr_can_edit_invoice = :cpr_can_edit_invoice, cpr_comment = :cpr_comment, pps_id = :purchasePurpose.id, cpr_reverse_calc = :cpr_reverse_calc, cps_id_seller = :contactPersonSeller.cps_id, cps_id_customer = :contactPersonCustomer.cps_id, cpr_guaranty_in_month = :cpr_guaranty_in_month, cpr_prepay_percent = :cpr_prepay_percent, cpr_prepay_sum = :cpr_prepay_sum, cpr_delay_days = :cpr_delay_days, ctr_id_consignee = :consignee.id, cpr_no_reservation = :cpr_no_reservation, cpr_provider_delivery = :cpr_provider_delivery, cpr_provider_delivery_address = :cpr_provider_delivery_address, cpr_delivery_count_day = :cpr_delivery_count_day, cpr_donot_calculate_netto = :cpr_donot_calculate_netto, cpr_print_scale = :cpr_print_scale, cpr_contract_scale = :cpr_contract_scale, cpr_invoice_scale = :cpr_invoice_scale, cpr_final_date_above = :cpr_final_date_above, cpr_tender_number = :cpr_tender_number, cpr_tender_number_editable = :cpr_tender_number_editable, cpr_proposal_declined = :cpr_proposal_declined where cpr_id = :cpr_id

update dcl_commercial_proposal set cpr_print_scale = :cpr_print_scale, cpr_contract_scale = :cpr_contract_scale, cpr_invoice_scale = :cpr_invoice_scale, cpr_final_date_above = :cpr_final_date_above where cpr_id = :cpr_id
update dcl_commercial_proposal set cpr_block = :cpr_block where cpr_id = :cpr_id

update dcl_commercial_proposal set cpr_check_price = :cpr_check_price, cpr_check_price_date = :cpr_check_price_date, usr_id_check_price = :usr_id_check_price, cpr_block = :cpr_block where cpr_id = :cpr_id

select usr_id_create as "createUser.usr_id", usr_id_edit as "editUser.usr_id", cpr_create_date as "usr_date_create", cpr_edit_date as "usr_date_edit", cpr_id, cpr_number, cpr_date, ctr_id as "contractor.id", cps_id as "contactPerson.cps_id", cpr_concerning, cpr_concerning_invoice, cpr_preamble, cur_id as "currency.id", cur_id_table as "currencyTable.id", cpr_course, cpr_nds, trm_id_price_condition as "priceCondition.id", cpr_country, cpr_pay_condition, cpr_pay_condition_invoice, trm_id_delivery_condition as "deliveryCondition.id", cpr_delivery_address, cpr_sum_transport, cpr_all_transport, cpr_sum_assembling, cpr_delivery_term, cpr_delivery_term_invoice, cpr_add_info, cpr_final_date, cpr_final_date_invoice, usr_id as "user.usr_id", executor_id as "executor.usr_id", cpr_executor_flag, cpr_date_accept, bln_id as "blank.bln_id", cpr_img_name, cpr_proposal_received_flag, cpr_block, cpr_summ, cpr_nds_by_string, cpr_old_version, cpr_assemble_minsk_store, cpr_free_prices, cpr_can_edit_invoice, cpr_comment, pps_id as "purchasePurpose.id", cpr_reverse_calc, cps_id_seller as "contactPersonSeller.cps_id", cps_id_customer as "contactPersonCustomer.cps_id", cpr_guaranty_in_month, cpr_prepay_percent, cpr_prepay_sum, cpr_delay_days, ctr_id_consignee as "consignee.id", cpr_no_reservation, cpr_provider_delivery, cpr_provider_delivery_address, cpr_delivery_count_day, cpr_donot_calculate_netto, cpr_print_scale, cpr_contract_scale, cpr_invoice_scale, cpr_final_date_above, cpr_check_price, cpr_tender_number, cpr_tender_number_editable, cpr_proposal_declined from dcl_commercial_proposal cpr where cpr_id = :cpr_id
select count(cpr_id) as "cpr_id" from dcl_commercial_proposal where bln_id = :blank.bln_id
select first 1 skip {cpr_id} cpr_id from dcl_commercial_proposal where bln_id = :blank.bln_id order by cpr_id

select lpr_id, cpr_id, lpr_produce_name, lpr_catalog_num, lpr_price_brutto, lpr_discount, lpr_price_netto, lpr_count, cus_id, cus_id as "customCode.id", cus_code as "customCode.code", cus_percent as "customCode.custom_percent", lpr_coeficient, stf_id as "stuffCategory.id", stf_name as "stuffCategory.name", prd_id as "produce.id", lpr_comment, lpc_id, lpc_cost_one_by, lpc_price_list_by, lpc_1c_number, lpr_sale_price, lpr_sale_cost_parking_trans from dcl_cpr_list_produces_load(:cpr_id, :cpr_date_tm)

insert into dcl_cpr_list_produce ( lpr_id, cpr_id, lpr_produce_name, lpr_catalog_num, lpr_price_brutto, lpr_discount, lpr_price_netto, lpr_count, cus_id, lpr_coeficient, stf_id, prd_id, lpr_comment, lpc_id, lpr_sale_price, lpr_sale_cost_parking_trans ) values ( :lpr_id, :cpr_id, :lpr_produce_name, :lpr_catalog_num, :lpr_price_brutto, :lpr_discount, :lpr_price_netto, :lpr_count, :customCode.id, :lpr_coeficient, :stuffCategory.id, :produce.id, :lpr_comment, :lpc_id, :lpr_sale_price, :lpr_sale_cost_parking_trans );
delete from dcl_cpr_list_produce where cpr_id = :cpr_id
select trn_id, cpr_id, stf_id as "stuffCategory.id", stf_name as "stuffCategory.name", trn_sum from dcl_cpr_transports_load(:cpr_id)
insert into dcl_cpr_transport ( trn_id, cpr_id, stf_id, trn_sum ) values( :trn_id, :cpr_id, :stuffCategory.id, :trn_sum )
delete from dcl_cpr_transport where cpr_id = :cpr_id

select lpc_id as "doc_id", prc_id as "id", prc_number as "number", prc_date as "date", prd_id as "produce.id", lpc_count as "count", reserved, free_count as "shipped_count", lpc_1c_number, ctn_number from dcl_get_rest_lpc_for_cpr(:cpr_id, :route.id, :number_1c, :prc_date_min_ts) order by prc_date descending, prc_id, lpc_id
select * from dcl_get_rest_lpc_for_lpr(:cpr_id, :lpc_id)
select * from dcl_get_reserved_info(:cpr_id, :lpc_id)

select * from dcl_cond_for_contract_filter( :contractor.name, :user.usr_name, :date_begin_date, :date_end_date, :seller.name, :cfc_not_executed, :annul_exclude, :cfc_not_placed ) order by executed_and_placed, cfc_place_date descending

select cfc_id from dcl_cond_for_contract_insert ( :cfc_place, :cfc_execute, :seller.id, :contractor.id, :cfc_doc_type, :cfc_con_number_txt, :cfc_con_date_ts, :currency.id, :contract.con_id, :cfc_spc_number_txt, :cfc_spc_date_ts, :cfc_pay_cond, :cfc_custom_point, :cfc_delivery_cond, :cfc_guarantee_cond, :cfc_montage_cond, :cfc_date_con_to_ts, :cfc_count_delivery, :contactPersonSign.cps_id, :contactPerson.cps_id, :cfc_delivery_count, :purchasePurpose.id, :cfc_comment, :cfc_need_invoice, :cfc_annul, :cfc_annul_date )

update dcl_cond_for_contract set cfc_place = :cfc_place, cfc_execute = :cfc_execute, sln_id = :seller.id, ctr_id = :contractor.id, cfc_doc_type = :cfc_doc_type, cfc_con_number_txt = :cfc_con_number_txt, cfc_con_date = :cfc_con_date_ts, cur_id = :currency.id, con_id = :contract.con_id, cfc_spc_number_txt = :cfc_spc_number_txt, cfc_spc_date = :cfc_spc_date_ts, cfc_pay_cond = :cfc_pay_cond, cfc_custom_point = :cfc_custom_point, cfc_delivery_cond = :cfc_delivery_cond, cfc_guarantee_cond = :cfc_guarantee_cond, cfc_montage_cond = :cfc_montage_cond, cfc_date_con_to = :cfc_date_con_to_ts, cfc_count_delivery = :cfc_count_delivery, cps_id_sign = :contactPersonSign.cps_id, cps_id = :contactPerson.cps_id, cfc_delivery_count = :cfc_delivery_count, pps_id = :purchasePurpose.id, cfc_comment = :cfc_comment, cfc_need_invoice = :cfc_need_invoice, cfc_annul = :cfc_annul, cfc_annul_date = :cfc_annul_date, cfc_check_price = :cfc_check_price, cfc_check_price_date = :cfc_check_price_date, usr_id_check_price = :usr_id_check_price where cfc_id = :cfc_id
update dcl_cond_for_contract set cfc_execute = :cfc_execute, usr_id_execute = :executeUser.usr_id where cfc_id = :cfc_id
select cfc_spc_number_txt, cfc_execute from dcl_cond_for_contract where cfc_id != coalesce(:cfc_id, -1) and con_id = :contract.con_id
update dcl_cond_for_contract set cfc_check_price = :cfc_check_price, cfc_check_price_date = :cfc_check_price_date, usr_id_check_price = :usr_id_check_price where cfc_id = :cfc_id

select usr_id_create as "createUser.usr_id", usr_id_edit as "editUser.usr_id", usr_id_place as "placeUser.usr_id", usr_id_execute as "executeUser.usr_id", usr_id_edit_annul as "annulUser.usr_id", cfc_create_date as "usr_date_create", cfc_edit_date as "usr_date_edit", cfc_place_date as "usr_date_place", cfc_execute_date as "usr_date_execute", cfc_edit_annul_date as "usr_date_annul", cfc_place, cfc_execute, sln_id as "seller.id", ctr_id as "contractor.id", cfc_doc_type, cfc_con_number_txt, cfc_con_date, cur_id as "currency.id", con_id as "contract.con_id", cfc_spc_number_txt, cfc_spc_date, cfc_pay_cond, cfc_custom_point, cfc_delivery_cond, cfc_guarantee_cond, cfc_montage_cond, cfc_date_con_to, cfc_count_delivery, cps_id_sign as "contactPersonSign.cps_id", cps_id as "contactPerson.cps_id", cfc_delivery_count, pps_id as "purchasePurpose.id", cfc_comment, cfc_need_invoice, cfc_check_price, cfc_check_price_date, usr_id_check_price, cfc_annul, cfc_annul_date from dcl_cond_for_contract cfc where cfc_id = :cfc_id

select ccp_id, cfc_id, stf_id as "stuffCategory.id", stf_name as "stuffCategory.name", prd_id as "produce.id", ccp_price, ccp_count, ccp_nds_rate, cpr_id, cpr_number, cpr_date from dcl_cfc_produces_select(:cfc_id)

insert into dcl_cfc_list_produce ( cfc_id, stf_id, prd_id, ccp_price, ccp_count, ccp_nds_rate, cpr_id ) values( :cfc_id, :stuffCategory.id, :produce.id, :ccp_price, :ccp_count, :ccp_nds_rate, :cpr_id );
delete from dcl_cfc_list_produce where cfc_id = :cfc_id

select * from dcl_contract_filter( :number, :contractor.name, :date_begin_date, :date_end_date, :sum_min, :sum_max, :user.usr_name, :con_executed, :oridinal_absent, :seller.name ) order by con_reminder descending, con_date descending, con_number descending

select con_id, con_number, con_date, sln_id as "seller.id", sln_name as "seller.name", sln_is_resident as "seller.resident", cur_id as "currency.id", cur_name as "currency.name", con_reusable, con_final_date, con_annul from dcl_contract_for_contractor( :ctr_id, :cur_id, :filter, :con_seller, :allCon, :onlyReusable, :conFinalDateAfterDb )
select con_id from dcl_contract where ctr_id = :ctr_id
select * from dcl_contract_for_cc_filter(:ctr_id)

select con_id from dcl_contract_insert( :con_date, :contractor.id, :currency.id, :con_number, :con_executed, :con_summ, :con_original, :con_annul, :con_annul_date, :con_comment, :seller.id, :con_reusable, :con_final_date )

update dcl_contract set con_number = :con_number, con_date = :con_date, ctr_id = :contractor.id, cur_id = :currency.id, con_executed = :con_executed, con_summ = :con_summ, con_original = :con_original, con_annul = :con_annul, con_annul_date = :con_annul_date, con_comment = :con_comment, sln_id = :seller.id, con_reusable = :con_reusable, con_final_date = :con_final_date where con_id = :con_id

select usr_id_create as "createUser.usr_id", usr_id_edit as "editUser.usr_id", con_create_date as "usr_date_create", con_edit_date as "usr_date_edit", con_id, con_number, con_date, ctr_id as "contractor.id", cur_id as "currency.id", con_summ, con_original, (select con_id from DCL_OCCUPIED_CONTRACT_V where con_id = con.con_id) as con_occupied, con_annul, con_annul_date, con_comment, sln_id as "seller.id", con_reusable, con_final_date from dcl_contract con where con_id = :con_id
select con_comment from dcl_contract where con_id = :con_id
delete from dcl_contract where con_id = :con_id

select spc_id, con_id, spc_number, spc_date, spc_summ, spc_summ_nds, spc_executed, spc_nds_rate, spc_delivery_date, spc_add_pay_cond, spc_delivery_cond, spc_delivery_term_type as "deliveryTerm.id", spc_percent_or_sum, spc_delivery_percent, spc_delivery_sum, spc_original, spc_montage, spc_pay_after_montage, spc_group_delivery, spc_annul, spc_annul_date, spc_comment, spc_occupied, spc_occupied_in_pay_shp, spc_in_ctc, payed_summ, payed_date, attachments_count as "attachmentsCount", usr_id as "user.usr_id", usr_name as "user.usr_name", spc_letter1_date, spc_letter2_date, spc_letter3_date, spc_complaint_in_court_date, spc_additional_days_count from dcl_con_list_specs_load(:con_id)
select spc_id, spc_number, spc_date, spc_summ, spc_original, spc_annul from dcl_con_list_spec where con_id = :con_id and spc_executed is null
select spc_id, spc_number, spc_date, spc_summ, spc_original, spc_annul from dcl_con_list_spec where con_id = :con_id
select spc_number from dcl_con_list_spec where con_id = :con_id order by spc_date descending

select psum.lps_summ as "summ", pay.pay_date as "date" from dcl_payment pay, dcl_pay_list_summ psum where psum.spc_id = :spc_id and pay.pay_id = psum.pay_id and not exists ( select lps_id from dcl_ctc_pay where lps_id = psum.lps_id ) order by pay.pay_date
select psum.lps_summ as "summ", pay.pay_date as "date" from dcl_payment pay, dcl_pay_list_summ psum where psum.spc_id = :spc_id and pay.pay_id = psum.pay_id order by pay.pay_date
select sum(lps_summ) as "payed_summ" from dcl_pay_list_summ where spc_id = :spc_id
select payed_date from dcl_get_payed_date( :spc_id, :spc_summ, :spc_percent_or_sum, :spc_delivery_percent, :spc_delivery_sum )
select sum(shp_summ_plus_nds) as "shipped_summ" from dcl_shipping where spc_id = :spc_id and shp_id != :shp_id

select spc_id, con_id, spc_number, spc_date, spc_summ, spc_summ_nds, spc_executed, spc_nds_rate, spc_delivery_date, spc_add_pay_cond, spc_delivery_cond, spc_delivery_term_type as "deliveryTerm.id", spc_percent_or_sum, spc_delivery_percent, spc_delivery_sum, spc_original, spc_montage, spc_pay_after_montage, spc_group_delivery, usr_id as "user.usr_id", usr_name as "user.usr_name" from dcl_con_list_spec_load(:spc_id)
select spc_comment from dcl_con_list_spec where spc_id = :spc_id

select spc_id, con_id, spc_number, spc_date, spc_summ, spc_summ_nds, spc_executed, spc_nds_rate, spc_delivery_date, spc_delivery_cond, spc_delivery_term_type as "deliveryTerm.id", spc_percent_or_sum, spc_delivery_percent, spc_delivery_sum, spc_add_pay_cond, spc_original, spc_montage, spc_pay_after_montage, spc_group_delivery, (spc_summ - dNVL(cast( (select sum(lps_summ) from dcl_pay_list_summ where spc_id = spc.spc_id and pay_id != coalesce(:pay_id, -1) ) as double precision), 0)) as spc_summ_nr from dcl_con_list_spec spc where spc_id = :spc_id

select ord_id, usr_id_create as "createUser.usr_id", usr_id_edit as "editUser.usr_id", ord_create_date as "usr_date_create", ord_edit_date as "usr_date_edit", ord_number, ord_date, bln_id as "blank.bln_id", ctr_id as "contractor.id", cps_id as "contact_person.cps_id", ord_concerning, ord_preamble, ord_delivery_term, ord_pay_condition, ord_addr, trm_id as "deliveryCondition.id", ord_add_info, usr_id_director as "director.usr_id", usr_id_logist as "logist.usr_id", usr_id_director_rb as "director_rb.usr_id", usr_id_chief_dep as "chief_dep.usr_id", usr_id_manager as "manager.usr_id", ctr_id_for as "contractor_for.id", spc_id as "specification.spc_id", stf_id as "stuffCategory.id", ord_sent_to_prod_date, ord_received_conf_date, ord_num_conf, ord_date_conf, ord_conf_sent_date, ord_ready_for_deliv_date, ord_executed_date, ord_block, ord_summ, ord_delivery_cost_by, ord_delivery_cost, ord_donot_calculate_netto, cur_id as "currency.id", ord_include_nds, ord_nds_rate, sln_id_for_who as "sellerForWho.id", sln_id as "seller.id", ord_discount_all, ord_discount, ord_count_itog_flag, ord_add_reduction_flag, ord_add_reduction, ord_add_red_pre_pay_flag, ord_add_red_pre_pay, ord_all_include_in_spec, ord_annul, current_date - ord_sent_to_prod_date as count_day_curr_minus_sent_to_prod, ord_in_one_spec, ord_comment, ord_comment_covering_letter, ord_date_conf_all, ord_ready_for_deliv_date_all, sdt_id as "shippingDocType.id", ord_shp_doc_number, ord_by_guaranty, ord_ship_from_stock, ord_arrive_in_lithuania, ord_print_scale, ord_letter_scale, ord_logist_signature, ord_director_rb_signature, ord_chief_dep_signature, ord_manager_signature from dcl_order where ord_id = :ord_id

select * from dcl_get_prc_list_for_ord(:ord_id)

select ord.ord_id, ord.usr_id_create as "createUser.usr_id", ord.usr_id_edit as "editUser.usr_id", ord.ord_create_date as "usr_date_create", ord_edit_date as "usr_date_edit", ord.ord_number, ord.ord_date, ord.ctr_id as "contractor.id", ord.ctr_id_for as "contractor_for.id", ord.stf_id as "stuffCategory.id", ord.ord_in_one_spec, ord.spc_id as "specification.spc_id", ord.cur_id as "currency.id" from dcl_order ord, dcl_ord_list_produce opr where ord.ord_id = opr.ord_id and opr.opr_id = :opr_id

select opr_id, ord_id, opr_produce_name, opr_catalog_num, opr_count, opr_price_brutto, opr_discount, opr_price_netto, opr_summ, opr_use_prev_number, prd_id as "produce.id", opr_count_executed, opr_comment, drp_price, drp_max_extra, ctr_id as "contractor.id", ctr_name as "contractor.name", con_id as "contract.con_id", con_number as "contract.con_number", sln_id as "contract.seller.id", sln_name as "contract.seller.name", sln_is_resident as "contract.seller.resident", spc_id as "specification.spc_id", spc_number as "specification.spc_number", stf_id, opr_count_occupied, opr_occupied, specification_numbers as "specificationNumbers", opr_parent_id, opr_have_depend from dcl_ord_list_produces_load(:ord_id, null)

select opr_id, ord_id, opr_produce_name, opr_catalog_num, opr_count, opr_price_brutto, opr_discount, opr_price_netto, opr_summ, opr_use_prev_number, prd_id as "produce.id", opr_count_executed, opr_comment, drp_price, drp_max_extra, ctr_id as "contractor.id", ctr_name as "contractor.name", con_id as "contract.con_id", con_number as "contract.con_number", spc_id as "specification.spc_id", spc_number as "specification.spc_number", stf_id, opr_count_occupied, opr_occupied, specification_numbers as "specificationNumbers", opr_parent_id, opr_have_depend from dcl_ord_list_produces_load(:ord_id, 1)

select opr_id, ord_id, drp_price, drp_max_extra, opr_count_executed, ctr_id as "contractor.id", ctr_name as "contractor.name", spc_id as "specification.spc_id", spc_number as "specification.spc_number", spc_date as "specification.spc_date", spc_delivery_date as "specification.spc_delivery_date", con_number as "contract.con_number", con_date as "contract.con_date", cur_name as "contract.currency.name", opr_have_depend, opr_price_netto, prd_id as "produce.id" from dcl_ord_list_produce_load(:opr_id)

update dcl_ord_list_produce set ord_id = :ord_id, opr_produce_name = :opr_produce_name, opr_catalog_num = :opr_catalog_num, opr_count = :opr_count, opr_price_brutto = :opr_price_brutto, opr_discount = :opr_discount, opr_price_netto = :opr_price_netto, opr_summ = :opr_summ, opr_use_prev_number = :opr_use_prev_number, prd_id = :produce.id, opr_comment = :opr_comment, drp_price = :drp_price, drp_max_extra = :drp_max_extra, ctr_id = :contractor.id, spc_id = :specification.spc_id, opr_parent_id = :opr_parent_id, opr_have_depend = :opr_have_depend where opr_id = :opr_id;

select ptr_id, opr_id, ptr_count, ptr_date, ptr_comment from dcl_production_term where opr_id = :opr_id order by ptr_date

insert into dcl_production_term ( opr_id, ptr_count, ptr_date, ptr_comment ) values ( :opr_id, :ptr_count, :ptr_date, :ptr_comment )

select rfs.rfs_id, rfs.opr_id, rfs.sdt_id as "shippingDocType.id", sdt.sdt_name as "shippingDocType.name", rfs.rfs_number, rfs.rfs_count, rfs.rfs_date, rfs.rfs_ship_from_stock, rfs.rfs_arrive_in_lithuania, rfs.rfs_weight, rfs.rfs_gabarit, rfs.rfs_comment from dcl_ready_for_shipping rfs, dcl_shp_doc_type sdt where rfs.opr_id = :opr_id and sdt.sdt_id = rfs.sdt_id order by rfs_date
delete from dcl_ready_for_shipping where opr_id = :opr_id

insert into dcl_ready_for_shipping ( opr_id, sdt_id, rfs_number, rfs_count, rfs_date, rfs_ship_from_stock, rfs_arrive_in_lithuania, rfs_weight, rfs_gabarit, rfs_comment ) values ( :opr_id, :shippingDocType.id, :rfs_number, :rfs_count, :rfs_date, :rfs_ship_from_stock, :rfs_arrive_in_lithuania, :rfs_weight, :rfs_gabarit, :rfs_comment )

select * from dcl_ord_list_pay_sum where ord_id = :ord_id order by ops_id
delete from dcl_ord_list_pay_sum where ord_id = :ord_id
insert into dcl_ord_list_pay_sum ( ord_id, ops_sum, ops_date ) values ( :ord_id, :ops_sum, :ops_date )
select * from dcl_opr_list_executed executed, dcl_ord_list_produce opr where opr.ord_id = :ord_id and executed.opr_id = opr.opr_id order by opr.opr_id
delete from dcl_opr_list_executed executed where opr_id = :opr_id

update dcl_produce_cost set prc_number = :prc_number, prc_date = :prc_date_ts, rut_id = :route.id, prc_block = :prc_block, prc_sum_transport = :prc_sum_transport, prc_weight = :prc_weight, prc_course_ltl_eur = :prc_course_ltl_eur where prc_id = :prc_id
update dcl_produce_cost set prc_block=:prc_block where prc_id=:prc_id

select usr_id_create as "createUser.usr_id", usr_id_edit as "editUser.usr_id", prc_create_date as "usr_date_create", prc_edit_date as "usr_date_edit", prc_id, prc_number, prc_date, rut_id as "route.id", (select rut_name from dcl_route where rut_id = prc.prc_id) as "route.name", prc_sum_transport, prc_weight, prc_course_ltl_eur, prc_block from dcl_produce_cost prc where prc_id=:prc_id

select lpc_id, prc_id, lpc_produce_name, stf_id as "stuffCategory.id", stf_name as "stuffCategory.name", usr_id as "manager.usr_id", usr_name as "manager.usr_name", usr_code as "manager.usr_code", lpc_count, lpc_cost_one_ltl, lpc_cost_one_by, lpc_price_list_by, lpc_cost_one, lpc_weight, lpc_summ, lpc_sum_transport, lpc_custom, lpc_percent as "lpc_percent_dcl_1_4", lpc_1c_number, lpc_occupied, prs_id as "purpose.id", prs_name as "purpose.name", prd_id as "produce.id", opr_id, asm_id, apr_id, drp_id, sip_id, dep_id as "department.id", dep_name as "department.name", lpc_comment, no_round as "noRound" from dcl_prc_list_produces_load(:prc_id)

insert into dcl_prc_list_produce ( lpc_id, prc_id, lpc_produce_name, stf_id, usr_id, lpc_count, lpc_cost_one_ltl, lpc_cost_one_by, lpc_price_list_by, lpc_cost_one, lpc_weight, lpc_summ, lpc_sum_transport, lpc_custom, lpc_1c_number, prs_id, prd_id, opr_id, asm_id, apr_id, drp_id, sip_id, lpc_percent, dep_id, lpc_comment ) values( :lpc_id, :prc_id, :lpc_produce_name, :stuffCategory.id, :manager.usr_id, :lpc_count, :lpc_cost_one_ltl, :lpc_cost_one_by, :lpc_price_list_by, :lpc_cost_one, :lpc_weight, :lpc_summ, :lpc_sum_transport, :lpc_custom, :lpc_1c_number, :purpose.id, :produce.id, :opr_id, :asm_id, :apr_id, :drp_id, :sip_id, :lpc_percent_dcl_1_4, :department.id, :lpc_comment )

update dcl_prc_list_produce set prc_id = :prc_id, lpc_produce_name = :lpc_produce_name, stf_id = :stuffCategory.id, usr_id = :manager.usr_id, lpc_count = :lpc_count, lpc_cost_one_ltl = :lpc_cost_one_ltl, lpc_cost_one_by = :lpc_cost_one_by, lpc_price_list_by = :lpc_price_list_by, lpc_cost_one = :lpc_cost_one, lpc_weight = :lpc_weight, lpc_summ = :lpc_summ, lpc_sum_transport = :lpc_sum_transport, lpc_custom = :lpc_custom, lpc_percent = :lpc_percent_dcl_1_4, lpc_1c_number = :lpc_1c_number, prs_id = :purpose.id, prd_id = :produce.id, opr_id = :opr_id, asm_id = :asm_id, apr_id = :apr_id, drp_id = :drp_id, sip_id = :sip_id, dep_id = :department.id where lpc_id = :lpc_id;

delete from dcl_prc_list_produce lpc where prc_id = :prc_id and not exists ( select lpc_id from DCL_OCCUPIED_PRC_PRODUCE_V where lpc_id = lpc.lpc_id ) and not exists ( select lpc_id from DCL_OCCUPIED_PRC_PRODUCE_CPR_V where lpc_id = lpc.lpc_id )

select opr_id as "doc_id", ord_id as "id", ord_number as "number", ord_date as "date", ctr_name as "contractor", prd_id as "produce.id", opr_count_executed as "count", ctn_number, seller from dcl_get_rest_opr_for_prc(:prc_id) order by ord_date descending, ord_id, opr_id

select apr_id as "doc_id", asm_id as "id", asm_number as "number", asm_date as "date", prd_id as "produce.id", apr_count as "count", ctn_number from dcl_get_rest_asm_for_prc(:prc_id) order by asm_date descending, asm_id, apr_id

select drp_id as "doc_id", dlr_id as "id", dlr_number as "number", dlr_date as "date", prd_id as "produce.id", drp_count as "count", ctn_number from dcl_get_rest_drp_for_prc(:prc_id) order by dlr_date descending, dlr_id, drp_id
select sip_id as "doc_id", spi_id as "id", spi_number as "number", spi_date as "date", prd_id as "produce.id", sip_count as "count", ctn_number from dcl_get_rest_sip_for_prc(:prc_id)
select prc_id, lpc_percent, lpc_summ, lpc_summ_allocation from dcl_produce_cost_custom pcc where prc_id=:prc_id
insert into dcl_produce_cost_custom ( prc_id, lpc_percent, lpc_summ, lpc_summ_allocation ) values( :prc_id, :lpc_percent, :lpc_summ, :lpc_summ_allocation )
delete from dcl_produce_cost_custom where prc_id = :prc_id

select lpc_id, prc_id, lpc_produce_name, stf_id as "stuffCategory.id", stf_name as "stuffCategory.name", usr_id as "manager.usr_id", lpc_count, lpc_cost_one_ltl, lpc_cost_one_by, lpc_price_list_by, lpc_cost_one, lpc_weight, lpc_summ, lpc_sum_transport, lpc_custom, lpc_percent as "lpc_percent_dcl_1_4", lpc_1c_number, prs_id as "purpose.id", prs_name as "purpose.name", prd_id as "produce.id", dep_id as "department.id", dep_name as "department.name" from dcl_prc_list_produce_load(:lpc_id)
select * from dcl_payment_filter( :contractor.name, :contractor.id, :date_begin_date, :date_end_date, :sum_min, :sum_max, :block, :currency.id, :closed, :pay_account )

select pay.pay_id as pay_id, pay.pay_date as pay_date, sum(lps_summ) as pay_summ from dcl_payment pay, dcl_pay_list_summ psum where psum.spc_id = :specification.spc_id and pay.pay_id = psum.pay_id and pay.pay_block = 1 and not exists ( select distinct lps_id from dcl_ctc_pay ctc_pay where ctc_pay.lcc_id != coalesce(:lcc_id, -1) and ctc_pay.lps_id = psum.lps_id ) group by pay.pay_id, pay.pay_date
select pay_id from dcl_payment_insert ( :pay_date_ts, :pay_account, :contractor.id, :currency.id, :pay_block, :pay_summ, :pay_course, :pay_comment, :pay_course_nbrb, :pay_course_nbrb_date_ts )

update dcl_payment set pay_date = :pay_date_ts, pay_account = :pay_account, ctr_id = :contractor.id, cur_id = :currency.id, pay_block = :pay_block, pay_summ = :pay_summ, pay_course = :pay_course, pay_comment = :pay_comment, pay_course_nbrb = :pay_course_nbrb, pay_course_nbrb_date = :pay_course_nbrb_date_ts where pay_id = :pay_id

select usr_id_create as "createUser.usr_id", usr_id_edit as "editUser.usr_id", pay_create_date as "usr_date_create", pay_edit_date as "usr_date_edit", pay_id, pay_date, pay_account, ctr_id as "contractor.id", (select ctr_name from dcl_contractor where ctr_id = pay.ctr_id) as "contractor.name", cur_id as "currency.id", (select cur_name from dcl_currency where cur_id = pay.cur_id) as "currency.name", pay_block, pay_summ, pay_course, pay_comment, ( select is_pay_closed from dcl_is_pay_closed(:pay_id) ) as pay_closed, pay_course_nbrb, pay_course_nbrb_date from dcl_payment pay where pay_id = :pay_id

select lps_id, pay_id, spc.con_id as "contract.con_id", (select con_number from dcl_contract where con_id=spc.con_id) as "contract.con_number", (select con_date from dcl_contract where con_id=spc.con_id) as "contract.con_date", (select cur_id from dcl_contract where con_id=spc.con_id) as "contract.currency.id", lps.spc_id as "specification.spc_id", (select spc_number from dcl_con_list_spec where spc_id=lps.spc_id) as "specification.spc_number", (select spc_date from dcl_con_list_spec where spc_id=lps.spc_id) as "specification.spc_date", (select spc_nds_rate from dcl_con_list_spec where spc_id=lps.spc_id) as "specification.spc_nds_rate", lps_summ, (select lps_id from dcl_ctc_pay where lps_id = lps.lps_id) as lps_occupied from dcl_pay_list_summ lps, dcl_con_list_spec spc where pay_id = :pay_id and spc.spc_id = lps.spc_id order by lps_id
insert into dcl_pay_list_summ ( lps_id, pay_id, spc_id, lps_summ, lps_summ_eur, lps_summ_out_nds ) values( :lps_id, :pay_id, :specification.spc_id, :lps_summ, :lps_summ_eur, :lps_summ_out_nds )
update dcl_pay_list_summ set pay_id = :pay_id, spc_id = :specification.spc_id, lps_summ = :lps_summ, lps_summ_eur = :lps_summ_eur, lps_summ_out_nds = :lps_summ_out_nds where lps_id = :lps_id
execute procedure dcl_update_delivery_date(:specification.spc_id);
select lps_id, pay_id, spc_id as "specification.spc_id", lps_summ, lps_summ_eur, lps_summ_out_nds from dcl_pay_list_summ where lps_id = :lps_id
delete from dcl_pay_list_summ lps where pay_id = :pay_id and not exists ( select lps_id from dcl_ctc_pay where lps_id = lps.lps_id )
select * from dcl_shipping_filter( :number, :contractor.name, :date_begin_date, :date_end_date, :sum_min, :sum_max, :block, :closed, :currency.id, :seller.name )

select shp_id, shp_date as shp_date_ts, shp_number, shp_summ_plus_nds, shp_summ_transport, shp_sum_update, shp_original from dcl_shipping shp where spc_id = :specification.spc_id and shp_block = 1 and not exists ( select distinct shp_id from dcl_ctc_shp ctc_shp where ctc_shp.lcc_id != coalesce(:lcc_id, -1) and ctc_shp.shp_id = shp.shp_id ) /* and ( select coalesce(count(lps.lps_id), 0) from dcl_shipping shp1, dcl_shp_list_produce lps, dcl_prc_list_produce lpc, dcl_produce_cost prc where shp1.spc_id = :specification.spc_id and lps.shp_id = shp.shp_id and lpc.lpc_id = lps.lpc_id and prc.prc_id = lpc.prc_id and prc.prc_block is null ) = 0 */

select shp_number, shp_create_date, shp.usr_id_create as "createUser.usr_id", shp_edit_date, shp.usr_id_edit as "editUser.usr_id", shp_date as shp_date_ts, shp_date_expiration as shp_date_expiration_ts, shp.ctr_id as "contractor.id", shp.spc_id as "specification.spc_id", shp_summ_plus_nds, shp_summ_transport, shp_sum_update, shp_block, shp.cur_id "currency.id", shp_letter1_date, shp_letter2_date, shp_letter3_date, shp_complaint_in_court_date, shp_comment, shp_montage, shp_serial_num_year_out, ( select is_shp_closed from dcl_is_shp_closed(:shp_id) ) as shp_closed, shp.ctr_id_where as "contractorWhere.id", shp.con_id_where as "contractWhere.con_id", shp_notice_date, shp_original from dcl_shipping shp where shp_id = :shp_id

select shp_id from dcl_shipping_insert ( :shp_number, :shp_date_ts, :shp_date_expiration_ts, :specification.spc_id, :shp_summ_plus_nds, :currency.id, :contractor.id, :shp_letter1_date_ts, :shp_letter2_date_ts, :shp_letter3_date_ts, :shp_complaint_in_court_date_ts, :shp_comment, :shp_montage, :shp_serial_num_year_out, :contractorWhere.id, :contractWhere.con_id, :shp_notice_date_ts, :shp_summ_transport, :shp_original, :shp_sum_update )

update dcl_shipping set shp_number = :shp_number, shp_date = :shp_date_ts, shp_date_expiration = :shp_date_expiration_ts, spc_id = :specification.spc_id, shp_summ_plus_nds = :shp_summ_plus_nds, shp_summ_transport = :shp_summ_transport, shp_sum_update = :shp_sum_update, cur_id = :currency.id, ctr_id = :contractor.id, shp_letter1_date = :shp_letter1_date_ts, shp_letter2_date = :shp_letter2_date_ts, shp_letter3_date = :shp_letter3_date_ts, shp_complaint_in_court_date = :shp_complaint_in_court_date_ts, shp_comment = :shp_comment, shp_montage = :shp_montage, shp_serial_num_year_out = :shp_serial_num_year_out, ctr_id_where = :contractorWhere.id, con_id_where = :contractWhere.con_id, shp_notice_date = :shp_notice_date_ts, shp_original = :shp_original where shp_id = :shp_id

select cps_id, ctr_id, cps_name, upper(cps_name) as cps_name_sort, cps_position, cps_on_reason, cps_phone, cps_mob_phone, cps_fax, cps_email, cps_block, cps_contract_comment, cps_fire from dcl_contact_person where ctr_id = :id order by cps_name_sort
select cps_id from dcl_contact_person_insert ( :ctr_id, :cps_name, :cps_phone, :cps_mob_phone, :cps_fax, :cps_block, :cps_position, :cps_on_reason, :cps_email, :cps_contract_comment, :cps_fire )

update dcl_contact_person set ctr_id = :ctr_id, cps_name = :cps_name, cps_position = :cps_position, cps_on_reason = :cps_on_reason, cps_phone = :cps_phone, cps_mob_phone = :cps_mob_phone, cps_fax = :cps_fax, cps_email = :cps_email, cps_block = :cps_block, cps_contract_comment = :cps_contract_comment, cps_fire = :cps_fire where cps_id = :cps_id
select cps_id, ctr_id, cps_name, cps_position, cps_on_reason, cps_phone, cps_mob_phone, cps_fax, cps_email, cps_block, cps_contract_comment, cps_fire from dcl_contact_person where cps_id = :cps_id

select cps_id, usr_id as "user.usr_id", (select usr_name from dcl_user_language where usr_id = cps_usr.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as "user.usr_name", (select usr_surname from dcl_user_language where usr_id = cps_usr.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as "user.usr_surname" from dcl_contact_person_user cps_usr where cps_usr.cps_id = :cps_id
delete from dcl_contact_person_user where cps_id = :cps_id
insert into dcl_contact_person_user ( cps_id, usr_id ) values( :cps_id, :user.usr_id )

select acc.acc_id, acc.acc_name, acc.acc_account, acc.cur_id as "currency.id", ( select cur_name from dcl_currency where cur_id = acc.cur_id ) as "currency.name", acc_index from dcl_account acc where acc.ctr_id = :id order by acc_id
delete from dcl_account where ctr_id = :id
insert into dcl_account ( ctr_id, acc_name, acc_account, cur_id, acc_index ) values( :ctr_id, :acc_name, :acc_account, :currency.id, :acc_index )

select ctr_id, usr_id as "user.usr_id", (select usr_name from dcl_user_language where usr_id = ctr_usr.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as "user.usr_name", (select usr_surname from dcl_user_language where usr_id = ctr_usr.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as "user.usr_surname" from dcl_contractor_user ctr_usr where ctr_usr.ctr_id = :id
select usr_id from dcl_contractor_user where ctr_id = :ctr_id and usr_id = :user.usr_id
delete from dcl_contractor_user where ctr_id = :id
insert into dcl_contractor_user ( ctr_id, usr_id ) values( :ctr_id, :user.usr_id )
delete from dcl_pay_message where ctr_id = :ctr_id and usr_id not in ({new_user_ids}) and pms_no_curator = 1
update dcl_pay_message set pms_no_curator = null where ctr_id = :ctr_id and pms_no_curator = 1
select * from dcl_department
insert into dcl_department (dep_name) values(:dep_name)
update dcl_department set dep_name = :dep_name where dep_id = :dep_id
select dep_name from dcl_department where dep_id = :dep_id
select cur_id, cur_name, cur_no_round, coalesce (cur_sort_order, 2) as sort_order from dcl_currency order by sort_order, cur_id
insert into dcl_currency(cur_name, cur_no_round) values(upper(:cur_name), :cur_no_round)
update dcl_currency set cur_name = upper(:cur_name), cur_no_round = :cur_no_round where cur_id = :cur_id
select cur_name, cur_no_round from dcl_currency where cur_id = :cur_id
select crt_id, crt_date, crt_rate from dcl_currency_rate where cur_id = :cur_id order by crt_date descending
insert into dcl_currency_rate( cur_id, crt_date, crt_rate ) values( :cur_id, :crt_date, :crt_rate )
update dcl_currency_rate set crt_date = :crt_date, crt_rate = :crt_rate where crt_id = :crt_id
select crt_date, crt_rate from dcl_currency_rate where crt_id = :crt_id
select * from dcl_currency_rate_for_date(:cur_id, :crt_date)
select * from dcl_currencies_rates_for_date(:courseDateTs)

select count(crt_id) as "countRatesBefore" from dcl_currency_rate where cur_id = :cur_id and crt_date = ( select max(crt_date) from dcl_currency_rate where cur_id = :cur_id and crt_date <= :crt_date )
select crt_id from dcl_currency_rate where cur_id = :cur_id and crt_date = :crt_date
select * from dcl_currency_rate_min_date

select upper(stf.stf_name) as stf_name_sort, stf_id, stf_name, stf_show_in_montage, (select stf_id from DCL_OCCUPIED_STUFF_CATEGORY_V where stf_id = stf.stf_id) as stf_occupied, (select distinct stf_id from dcl_montage_adjustment where stf_id = stf.stf_id) as stf_occupied_in_montage from dcl_stuff_category stf order by stf_name_sort
select * from dcl_stuff_category_filter(:filter, :montage)
insert into dcl_stuff_category(stf_name, stf_show_in_montage) values(:stf_name, :stf_show_in_montage)
update dcl_stuff_category set stf_name = :stf_name, stf_show_in_montage = :stf_show_in_montage where stf_id = :stf_id
select stf_name, stf_show_in_montage from dcl_stuff_category where stf_id = :stf_id
delete from dcl_stuff_category where stf_id = :stf_id

select upper(mad.mad_machine_type) as mad_machine_type_sort, mad.mad_complexity as "complexityCategory.name", mad.mad_id, mad.mad_machine_type, mad.mad_complexity, mad.mad_annul, madh.mad_date_from, madh.mad_mech_work_tariff, madh.mad_mech_work_rule_montage, madh.mad_mech_work_rule_adjustment, madh.mad_mech_road_tariff, madh.mad_mech_road_rule, madh.mad_el_work_tariff, madh.mad_el_work_rule_montage, madh.mad_el_work_rule_adjustment, madh.mad_el_road_tariff, madh.mad_el_road_rule from dcl_montage_adjustment mad left join dcl_montage_adjustment_h madh on ( madh.mad_id = mad.mad_id and madh.mad_date_from = ( select max(mad_date_from) from dcl_montage_adjustment_h where mad_id = mad.mad_id and mad_date_from <= (SELECT CAST('NOW' AS DATE) FROM RDB$DATABASE) ) ) where mad.stf_id = :stuffCategory.id order by mad_machine_type_sort
select upper(mad_machine_type) as mad_machine_type_sort, mad_id, mad_machine_type, mad_annul from dcl_montage_adjustment where stf_id = :id order by mad_machine_type_sort
select mad_machine_type, mad_complexity as "complexityCategory.name", mad_annul from dcl_montage_adjustment where mad_id = :mad_id
select mad_id from dcl_montage_adjustment_insert ( :stf_id, :mad_machine_type, :complexityCategory.name )
update dcl_montage_adjustment set mad_machine_type = :mad_machine_type, mad_complexity = :complexityCategory.name, mad_annul = :mad_annul where mad_id = :mad_id

select madh_id, mad_id, mad_date_from, mad_mech_work_tariff, mad_mech_work_rule_montage, mad_mech_work_rule_adjustment, mad_mech_road_tariff, mad_mech_road_rule, mad_el_work_tariff, mad_el_work_rule_montage, mad_el_work_rule_adjustment, mad_el_road_tariff, mad_el_road_rule from dcl_montage_adjustment_h where mad_id = :mad_id order by mad_date_from

select mad_date_from, mad_mech_work_tariff, mad_mech_work_rule_montage, mad_mech_work_rule_adjustment, mad_mech_road_tariff, mad_mech_road_rule, mad_el_work_tariff, mad_el_work_rule_montage, mad_el_work_rule_adjustment, mad_el_road_tariff, mad_el_road_rule from dcl_montage_adjustment_h where madh_id = :madh_id

insert into dcl_montage_adjustment_h ( mad_id, mad_date_from, mad_mech_work_tariff, mad_mech_work_rule_montage, mad_mech_work_rule_adjustment, mad_mech_road_tariff, mad_mech_road_rule, mad_el_work_tariff, mad_el_work_rule_montage, mad_el_work_rule_adjustment, mad_el_road_tariff, mad_el_road_rule ) values( :mad_id, :mad_date_from, :mad_mech_work_tariff, :mad_mech_work_rule_montage, :mad_mech_work_rule_adjustment, :mad_mech_road_tariff, :mad_mech_road_rule, :mad_el_work_tariff, :mad_el_work_rule_montage, :mad_el_work_rule_adjustment, :mad_el_road_tariff, :mad_el_road_rule )

update dcl_montage_adjustment_h set mad_date_from = :mad_date_from, mad_mech_work_tariff = :mad_mech_work_tariff, mad_mech_work_rule_montage = :mad_mech_work_rule_montage, mad_mech_work_rule_adjustment = :mad_mech_work_rule_adjustment, mad_mech_road_tariff = :mad_mech_road_tariff, mad_mech_road_rule = :mad_mech_road_rule, mad_el_work_tariff = :mad_el_work_tariff, mad_el_work_rule_montage = :mad_el_work_rule_montage, mad_el_work_rule_adjustment = :mad_el_work_rule_adjustment, mad_el_road_tariff = :mad_el_road_tariff, mad_el_road_rule = :mad_el_road_rule where madh_id = :madh_id
select rut_id, rut_name, (select rut_id from DCL_OCCUPIED_ROUTE_V where rut_id = rut.rut_id) as rut_occupied from dcl_route rut
insert into dcl_route(rut_name) values(:rut_name)
update dcl_route set rut_name = :rut_name where rut_id = :rut_id
select rut_name from dcl_route where rut_id = :rut_id
delete from dcl_route where rut_id = :rut_id
select sln_id, sln_name, sln_used_in_order, sln_prefix_for_order, sln_is_resident, (select sln_id from DCL_OCCUPIED_SELLER_V where sln_id = sln.sln_id) as sln_occupied from dcl_seller sln
select sln_id as "id", sln_name as "name", sln_used_in_order as "usedInOrder", sln_prefix_for_order as "prefixForOrder", sln_is_resident as "resident" from dcl_seller sln
select sln_id as "id", sln_name as "name", sln_used_in_order as "usedInOrder", sln_prefix_for_order as "prefixForOrder", sln_is_resident as "resident" from dcl_seller sln where sln_used_in_order = 1
insert into dcl_seller(sln_name, sln_used_in_order, sln_prefix_for_order, sln_is_resident) values(:sln_name, :sln_used_in_order, :sln_prefix_for_order, :sln_is_resident)
update dcl_seller set sln_name = :sln_name, sln_used_in_order = :sln_used_in_order, sln_prefix_for_order = :sln_prefix_for_order, sln_is_resident = :sln_is_resident where sln_id = :sln_id
select sln_name, sln_used_in_order, sln_prefix_for_order, sln_is_resident from dcl_seller where sln_id = :sln_id
delete from dcl_seller where sln_id = :sln_id

select unt_id, (upper((select unt_name from dcl_unit_language unt_lng, dcl_language lng where unt_id = unt.unt_id and unt_lng.lng_id = lng.lng_id and lng.lng_letter_id = 'RU'))), (select unt_name from dcl_unit_language unt_lng, dcl_language lng where unt_id = unt.unt_id and unt_lng.lng_id = lng.lng_id and lng.lng_letter_id = 'RU') as unt_name_ru, (select unt_name from dcl_unit_language unt_lng, dcl_language lng where unt_id = unt.unt_id and unt_lng.lng_id = lng.lng_id and lng.lng_letter_id = 'EN') as unt_name_en, (select unt_name from dcl_unit_language unt_lng, dcl_language lng where unt_id = unt.unt_id and unt_lng.lng_id = lng.lng_id and lng.lng_letter_id = 'DE') as unt_name_de from dcl_unit unt order by 2

select unt_id, (upper((select unt_name from dcl_unit_language unt_lng, dcl_language lng where unt_id = unt.unt_id and unt_lng.lng_id = lng.lng_id and lng.lng_letter_id = 'RU'))), (select unt_name from dcl_unit_language unt_lng, dcl_language lng where unt_id = unt.unt_id and unt_lng.lng_id = lng.lng_id and lng.lng_letter_id = 'RU') as unt_name_ru, (select unt_name from dcl_unit_language unt_lng, dcl_language lng where unt_id = unt.unt_id and unt_lng.lng_id = lng.lng_id and lng.lng_letter_id = 'EN') as unt_name_en, (select unt_name from dcl_unit_language unt_lng, dcl_language lng where unt_id = unt.unt_id and unt_lng.lng_id = lng.lng_id and lng.lng_letter_id = 'DE') as unt_name_de, is_acceptable_for_cpr from dcl_unit unt order by 2
select is_acceptable_for_cpr from dcl_unit where unt_id=:unt_id
select unt_id from dcl_unit_insert(:is_acceptable_for_cpr)
update dcl_unit set is_acceptable_for_cpr=:is_acceptable_for_cpr where unt_id=:unt_id returning 1

select lng.lng_id, lng.lng_name, (select unt_id from dcl_unit_language where lng_id = lng.lng_id and unt_id=:unt_id) as unt_id, (select unt_name from dcl_unit_language where lng_id = lng.lng_id and unt_id=:unt_id) as unt_name from dcl_language lng
insert into dcl_unit_language (unt_id, unt_name, lng_id) values(:unt_id, :unt_name, :lng_id)
update dcl_unit_language set unt_name = :unt_name where unt_id = :unt_id and lng_id = :lng_id
select prs_id, prs_name from dcl_purpose
insert into dcl_purpose(prs_name) values(:prs_name)
update dcl_purpose set prs_name = :prs_name where prs_id = :prs_id
select prs_name from dcl_purpose where prs_id = :prs_id
select pps_id, pps_name from dcl_purchase_purpose
insert into dcl_purchase_purpose(pps_name) values(:pps_name)
update dcl_purchase_purpose set pps_name = :pps_name where pps_id = :pps_id
select pps_name from dcl_purchase_purpose where pps_id = :pps_id
select rtn_id, rtn_date_from, rtn_percent from dcl_rate_nds order by rtn_date_from
select first 1 rtn_id as "id", rtn_date_from as "dateFrom", rtn_percent as "percent" from dcl_rate_nds where rtn_date_from <= :dateFromTS order by rtn_date_from descending
insert into dcl_rate_nds(rtn_date_from, rtn_percent) values(:rtn_date_from, :rtn_percent)
update dcl_rate_nds set rtn_date_from = :rtn_date_from, rtn_percent = :rtn_percent where rtn_id = :rtn_id
select rtn_date_from, rtn_percent from dcl_rate_nds where rtn_id = :rtn_id
select rpt_id, rpt_level, rpt_description, rpt_default_in_ctc from dcl_reputation order by rpt_level, rpt_id
insert into dcl_reputation(rpt_level, rpt_description, rpt_default_in_ctc) values(:number.number, :rpt_description, :rpt_default_in_ctc)
update dcl_reputation set rpt_level = :number.number, rpt_description = :rpt_description, rpt_default_in_ctc = :rpt_default_in_ctc where rpt_id = :rpt_id
select rpt_level as "number.number", rpt_description, rpt_default_in_ctc from dcl_reputation where rpt_id = :rpt_id
select lng_id, lng_name, lng_letter_id from dcl_language
insert into dcl_language(lng_name, lng_letter_id) values(:lng_name, :lng_letter_id)
update dcl_language set lng_name=:lng_name, lng_letter_id=:lng_letter_id where lng_id=:lng_id
select lng_name, lng_letter_id from dcl_language where lng_id=:lng_id
select trm_id, trm_name, trm_name_extended from dcl_term_inco order by trm_order_id
select trm_id as "id", trm_name as "name", trm_name_extended as "nameExtended" from dcl_term_inco where trm_name in ({names})

select cc.cus_id, cc.cus_code, cc.cus_law_240_flag, cc.cus_description, cc.cus_percent, cc.cus_instant, cc.cus_block from dcl_custom_code cc, DCL_CUSTOM_CODE_V c where cc.cus_code = c.cus_code and cc.cus_instant = c.cus_instant
select * from dcl_custom_code_filter(:filter)

insert into dcl_custom_code ( cus_id_create, cus_id_edit, usr_id_create, usr_id_edit, usr_create_date, usr_edit_date, cus_code, cus_description, cus_percent, cus_instant ) values ( :createUser.usr_id, :editUser.usr_id, :createUserMain.usr_id, :editUserMain.usr_id, :usr_date_create_main, :usr_date_edit_main, :cus_code, :cus_description, :cus_percent_double, :cus_instant_ts )
update dcl_custom_code set cus_percent = :cus_percent_double, cus_instant = :cus_instant_ts, cus_id_edit = :editUser.usr_id where cus_id = :cus_id

update dcl_custom_code set cus_id_edit = :editUser.usr_id, usr_id_edit = :editUserMain.usr_id, usr_edit_date = :usr_date_edit_main, cus_code = :cus_code, cus_description = :cus_description where cus_code = :cus_code_old

select cus_id_create as "createUser.usr_id", (select usr_surname || ' ' || usr_name from dcl_user_language where usr_id = cus.cus_id_create and lng_id = 1) as "createUser.usr_name", cus_id_edit as "editUser.usr_id", (select usr_surname || ' ' || usr_name from dcl_user_language where usr_id = cus.cus_id_edit and lng_id = 1) as "editUser.usr_name", cus_create_date as "usr_date_create", cus_edit_date as "usr_date_edit", usr_id_create as "createUserMain.usr_id", (select usr_surname || ' ' || usr_name from dcl_user_language where usr_id = cus.usr_id_create and lng_id = 1) as "createUserMain.usr_name", usr_id_edit as "editUserMain.usr_id", (select usr_surname || ' ' || usr_name from dcl_user_language where usr_id = cus.usr_id_edit and lng_id = 1) as "editUserMain.usr_name", usr_create_date as "usr_date_create_main", usr_edit_date as "usr_date_edit_main", cus_code, cus_description, cus_percent as cus_percent_double, cus_instant from dcl_custom_code cus where cus_id = :cus_id

select first 1 cus_id_create as "createUser.usr_id", (select usr_surname || ' ' || usr_name from dcl_user_language where usr_id = cus.cus_id_create and lng_id = 1) as "createUser.usr_name", cus_id_edit as "editUser.usr_id", (select usr_surname || ' ' || usr_name from dcl_user_language where usr_id = cus.cus_id_edit and lng_id = 1) as "editUser.usr_name", cus_create_date as "usr_date_create", cus_edit_date as "usr_date_edit", usr_id_create as "createUserMain.usr_id", (select usr_surname || ' ' || usr_name from dcl_user_language where usr_id = cus.usr_id_create and lng_id = 1) as "createUserMain.usr_name", usr_id_edit as "editUserMain.usr_id", (select usr_surname || ' ' || usr_name from dcl_user_language where usr_id = cus.usr_id_edit and lng_id = 1) as "editUserMain.usr_name", usr_create_date as "usr_date_create_main", usr_edit_date as "usr_date_edit_main", cus_description from dcl_custom_code cus where cus_code = :cus_code
select cus_id, cus_percent, cus_instant from dcl_custom_code where cus_code = :cus_code order by cus_instant
select rol_id, rol_name from dcl_role
select * from dcl_role where rol_id = :rol_id
insert into dcl_role (rol_name) values(:rol_name)
update dcl_role set rol_name = :rol_name where rol_id = :rol_id

select usr_id, (select usr_name from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_name, (select usr_surname from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_surname from dcl_user u where not exists ( select ur.usr_id from dcl_user_role ur where ur.rol_id = :rol_id and ur.usr_id = u.usr_id ) order by usr_surname

select u.usr_id, (select usr_name from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_name, (select usr_surname from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_surname from dcl_user u, dcl_user_role ur where ur.rol_id = :rol_id and u.usr_id = ur.usr_id order by usr_surname

select r.rol_id as role_id, r.rol_name as role_name, u.usr_id, (select usr_name from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_name, (select usr_surname from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_surname, d.dep_id "dep.id", d.dep_name "dep.name" from dcl_user u, dcl_role r, dcl_department d where d.dep_id = u.dep_id order by r.rol_name

select first 500 ord.ord_id as ord_id, ord.ord_number as ord_number, cast(cast(ord.ord_date as date) as varchar(10)) as ord_date, (select ctr_name from dcl_contractor c where c.ctr_id = ord.ctr_id) as contractor_name, (select ctr_name from dcl_contractor c where c.ctr_id = ord.ctr_id_for) as contractor_for_name from dcl_order ord where (:ord_date is null or cast(ord.ord_date as date) = :ord_date) order by ord.ord_date desc, ord.ord_id desc

select r.rol_name as role_name, u.usr_id, (select usr_name from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_name, (select usr_surname from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_surname from dcl_user u, dcl_role r, dcl_user_role urm where r.rol_id = urm.rol_id and urm.usr_id = u.usr_id order by r.rol_name
select rol_id from dcl_user_role where usr_id = :usr_id
select * from dcl_user_actions(:usr_id)
insert into dcl_user_role (usr_id, rol_id) select usr_id, :rol_id from dcl_user where usr_id in ({selected_ids_in})
delete from dcl_user_role where usr_id in ({selected_ids_out}) and rol_id = :rol_id
delete from dcl_user_role where usr_id = :usr_id;
insert into dcl_user_role (usr_id, rol_id) select usr_id, :rol_id from dcl_user u where not exists ( select ur.usr_id from dcl_user_role ur where ur.rol_id = :rol_id and ur.usr_id = u.usr_id )
delete from dcl_user_role where rol_id = :rol_id
select * from dcl_blanks_load(:type)
select bln_id from dcl_blank_insert ( :blankType.id, :bln_name, :seller.id, :language.id, :bln_charset, :bln_preamble, :bln_note, :bln_usage )

update dcl_blank set bln_type = :blankType.id, bln_name = :bln_name, sln_id = :seller.id, lng_id = :language.id, bln_charset = :bln_charset, bln_preamble = :bln_preamble, bln_note = :bln_note, bln_usage = :bln_usage where bln_id = :bln_id

select bln_type as "blankType.id", bln_name, cast(null as integer) as "seller.id", cast(null as varchar(50)) as "seller.name", lng_id as "language.id", lng_name as "language.name", bln_charset, bln_preamble, bln_note, bln_usage from dcl_blank_load(:bln_id)
select * from dcl_blank_image where bln_id = :bln_id
delete from dcl_blank_image where bln_id = :bln_id

select * from dcl_action order by act_system_name
select * from dcl_action where act_id = :act_id
update dcl_action set act_name = :act_name, act_logging = :act_logging, act_check_access = :act_check_access where act_id = :act_id
select act_id, coalesce(act_name, act_system_name) as "act_name" from dcl_action where act_logging = 1
select rol.rol_id, rol.rol_name from dcl_role rol where not exists ( select ar.rol_id from dcl_action_role ar where ar.act_id = :act_id and ar.rol_id = rol.rol_id ) order by rol_name
select rol.rol_id, rol.rol_name from dcl_role rol, dcl_action_role ar where ar.act_id = :act_id and rol.rol_id = ar.rol_id order by rol_name

delete from dcl_action_role where rol_id in ({selected_ids_out}) and act_id = :act_id

insert into dcl_action_role (rol_id, act_id) select rol_id, :act_id from dcl_role rol where not exists ( select ar.rol_id from dcl_action_role ar where ar.act_id = :act_id and ar.rol_id = rol.rol_id )
delete from dcl_action_role where act_id = :act_id

select ctr_name as "name", ctr_full_name as "fullname", cut_id as "country.id", cut_name as "country.name", ctr_index as "index", ctr_region as "region", ctr_place as "place", ctr_street as "street", ctr_building as "building", ctr_add_info as "addInfo", ctr_phone as "phone", ctr_fax as "fax", ctr_email as "email", ctr_bank_props as "bank_props", account1, account2, accountVal as "accountVal", ctr_unp as "unp", ctr_okpo as "okpo", ctr_block as "block", rpt_id as "reputation.id", rpt_description as "reputation.description", ctr_double_account as "doubleAccount", byn_accounts as "accountsBYN", other_accounts as "accountsOther", ctr_comment as "comment" from dcl_contractor_load(:id)
select ctr_id as id from dcl_contractor where ctr_unp = :unp

select ctr.ctr_id as "id", ctr.ctr_name as "name", ctr.ctr_full_name as "fullname", ctr.ctr_double_account as "doubleAccount" from dcl_contractor ctr left join dcl_country cut on cut.cut_id = ctr.cut_id, dcl_account acc where acc.acc_account = :account and acc.ctr_id = ctr.ctr_id order by ctr.ctr_id
select distinct ctr_name from dcl_contractor ctr, dcl_account acc where acc.ctr_id = ctr.ctr_id and acc.acc_account = :account order by ctr.ctr_id
update dcl_contractor set ctr_block = :block where ctr_id = :id
update dcl_contact_person set cps_block = 1 where ctr_id = :id
update dcl_contact_person set cps_block = :cps_block where cps_id = :cps_id

select (select usr_name from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_name, (select usr_surname from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_surname, (select usr_position from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_position, usr_code, usr_login, usr_passwd, usr_phone, dep_id as "department.id", usr_respons_person, usr_no_login, usr_chief_dep, usr_fax, usr_email from dcl_user u where usr_id = :usr_id

select usr_id, (select usr_name from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_name, (select usr_surname from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_surname, (select usr_position from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_position, usr_login, usr_passwd, usr_phone, dep_id as "department.id", usr_respons_person, usr_no_login, usr_chief_dep, usr_fax, usr_email from dcl_user u where dep_id = :department.id and usr_chief_dep = 1 and usr_no_login is null

select usr_id, (select usr_name from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_name, (select usr_surname from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_surname, (select usr_position from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_position, usr_login, usr_passwd, usr_phone, dep_id as "department.id", usr_respons_person, usr_no_login, usr_chief_dep, usr_fax, usr_email from dcl_user u where usr_code = :usr_code

select u.usr_id, (select usr_name from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_name, (select usr_surname from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_surname, (select usr_position from dcl_user_language where usr_id = u.usr_id and lng_id = 1) as usr_position, usr_login, usr_passwd, usr_phone, dep_id as "department.id", usr_respons_person, usr_no_login, usr_chief_dep, usr_fax, usr_email from dcl_user u, dcl_user_language ul where u.usr_id = ul.usr_id and ul.lng_id = 1 and ul.usr_surname || ' ' || ul.usr_name like :userFullName
select usr_id, lng_id as "language.id", usr_name, usr_surname, usr_position from dcl_user_language where usr_id = :usr_id

select cus_id, cus_code as code, (select cus_percent from dcl_custom_code cus where cus_code = (select cus_code from dcl_custom_code cus where cus_id=cus_g.cus_id ) and cus_instant = ( select max(cus_instant) from dcl_custom_code where cus_code=cus.cus_code and cus_instant <= :date ) ) as custom_percent from dcl_custom_code cus_g where cus_id=:id

select cus_id as id, cus_code as code, (select cus_percent from dcl_custom_code cus where cus_code = (select cus_code from dcl_custom_code cus where cus_id = cus_g.cus_id ) and cus_instant = ( select max(cus_instant) from dcl_custom_code where cus_code=cus.cus_code and cus_instant <= :date ) ) as custom_percent from dcl_custom_code cus_g where cus_code=:code
select cus_id as id from dcl_custom_code where cus_code=:code
select cus_id as "id" from dcl_custom_code where cus_code = :code and cus_instant = :date
update dcl_custom_code set cus_block = :block where cus_code = :code
update dcl_custom_code set cus_law_240_flag = :law240Flag where cus_code = :code
